author: a42
title: This is why they shouldn't make bugs.
review:
I bought this because my local toy shops didn't sell the ones I wanted. Pros&Cons:

Pros

  • Brilliant, though strange, coulour scheme: teal, orange, black.
  • Awesome headpeice.
  • Wiings!
  • Ball shooter.
  • Interesting build.
  • Plenty of teal, new to HF.
  • Bag is new.

Cons

  • Impossible to pose well, can only lie down or crawl.
  • Red ball in mouth looks ugly
  • Spine, at end of tail, is attached ugly.

Overall, a pretty good set, the main problem is that it can't pose flying, or taking off, or landing. Was 9 euro in Ireland, good value for money.
